text.section:
Each trust account shall be:
titled "preneed trust account"; and
established by the seller in the seller's name.

A seller may:
commingle money from 2 or more preneed burial contracts; and
establish more than 1 trust account.

section.section: A trust account established under this subtitle shall be a single purpose trust.
Money in the trust account is not available to a creditor as an asset of the seller.

text.section:
Money in the trust account may be withdrawn only on the combined signatures of:
2 officers of a corporate seller; or
at least 2 individuals authorized to withdraw money for an unincorporated seller.
